Row.SQL: SELECT UnitType as PageId, FormationClass as PageGroupId, "Unit" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Units u WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT UnitType From HeroClasses where UnitType = u.UnitType) AND TraitType is null or TraitType <> "TRAIT_BARBARIAN"

SELECT Units.UnitType as PageId, "Heroes" as PageGroupId, "HeroUnit" as PageLayoutId, Units.Name, HeroClasses.HeroClassType as HeroClass, null as Tooltip FROM Units INNER JOIN HeroClasses ON Units.UnitType=HeroClasses.UnitType WHERE Units.TraitType is null or Units.TraitType <> "TRAIT_BARBARIAN"
